page.title: 19BRIAN ELLIS,FARMER.
page.content: { Brian Ellis}was born in Barrow in 1933 and came from a farming background. He now farms at{Lane Foot {Farm,}employing 2 men and seasonal help. Lane Foot farm is a{large business {proposition}covering 108.4 hectares of limestone based land. This means that cultivation is difficult, and most of the land is{pasture land}for 90 pure bred{Fresian cows}and 195{sheep.}The sheep are slaughtered for meat, and beef production is expanding because the{EEC milk quotas}have reduced milk production by 10%. Lane Foot farm now boasts much{modern {machinery,}computers are used to check the amount of nutrition recieved and milk given by each cow. Mr Ellis is chairman of the{County Agricultural {Show,}also of{Preston Farmers,}a co- operative which sells farming items.
